ComicInfo.Title: Dawn of the Arashikage Part Five
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Dawn of the Arashikage Part Five: The Joes catch up to Dawn during her battle with Firefly. Stormshadow helps Dawn and Snake Eyes' psyche relinquish their thirst for revenge. 'Budo' turns out to be Zartan, who disappears with Firefly over the side of an elevated train. Now that Dawn is 18 the Joes invite her to join their team, realizing that having two operatives code-named 'Snake Eyes' will help confuse Cobra.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 12:41:12. [CVDB664201] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:13. [Issue ID 1801537]
